pr_title: Continue task pipeline if currentState is null

timeline.message:
Continue pipeline if currentState is null

In this commit, if controller encounters null currentStates, it will
continue the pipeline and TaskSchedulingStage.

timeline.bodyText: This is the same as recordJob2?
timeline.author: NealSun96

timeline.bodyText: I understand that this is meant to be like an Integration test, but would it make more sense to stay in TestAssignableInstanceManager? Or should there be a unit test in TestAssignableInstanceManager?
timeline.author: NealSun96

replies.bodyText: Your point is somehow valid. But I prefer to keep as integration test and make sure pipeline runs no matter what currentState is. This way we can make sure null currentState will not effect any other stage as well.
replies.author: alirezazamani
